title: Enid, The - 1999 - Tears of the Sun  mp3 @ 320
description:
This album was released to coincide with the twenty-fifth anniversary of The Enid with tracks spanning the whole of the band&#039;s recording career from "In The Region Of Summer Stars" to a specially composed new piece of music, the title track "Tears Of The Sun". It remains a perfect introduction to the music of this eclectic band and founder member and composer Robert John Godfrey.
